name: LocalCoinSwap
description: LocalCoinSwap is building a P2P cryptocurrency exchange and launching an associated Cryptoshare ICO. LocalCoinSwap features a completely decentralized peer-to-peer trading structure. There are no centralized bank accounts, no verification requirements, and no restrictions on trade. Furthermore LocalCoinSwap distributes 100% of the sites profits to holders of Cryptoshares on a 1-to-1 basis, through a blockchain-based decentralized dividend application.
